name: Audible Presents Hold On with Eugene Mirman
bio: Storytelling aficionado and inquisitive host Eugene Mirman (Bob’s Burgers) sits down with special guests and pauses their true, entertaining, and personal stories to get the funny details they might have left out. Listen now in Audible Channels!
